item.title: Transition to a static webserve
item.description:
Here, I need to build my pages while previously PHP builds my pages at each calls (not exactly, this is why there is some temporary storage). At the time being, I host this site on Github and Netlify. It gives me some time before a switch to my official websites.

See https://hubpress.gitbooks.io/hubpress :hp-image: /covers/cover.png :published_at: 2019-01-31 :hp-tags: HubPress, Blog, Open_Source, :hp-alt-title: Switching to a static website
item.dc:creator: Vincent D.
